## Overview

systemsseRology is a collection of functions used to analyse multivariate systems serology data.
You can learn more about the workflow in `vignette("exampleAnalysis")`. 

## Installation

This requires the package devtools.

```{r installation, eval=FALSE}
install.packages("devtools")
install_github("LoosC/systemsseRology")
library(systemsseRology)
```
